ygData.subject: Problems with crawl reports
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, We had a problem with Heritrix not writing any crawl reports in the following case: The job was first paused due to a Low Disk Pause (caused by the

Hi, 

We had a problem with Heritrix not writing any crawl reports in the
f=
ollowing case:
The job was first paused due to a Low Disk Pause (caused by =
the
LowDiskPauseProcessor) because less than 20GB were left one the disk.
T=
hen we terminated the job manually. But then Heritrix did not write
any rep=
orts for it (beside an empty hosts-report), which was due to a
Java OutOfMe=
moryError (see error message below).

The state folder of the job had 165 G=
B, maybe this could be part of
the problem. 

Did any of you already encoun=
ter a similar problem with the report
writing, or have any hint to where th=
e problem could be? And
eventually a hint on how to avoid the problem for f=
uture crawls?

thanks & best regards,

Nathalie Steinmetz
